name: Air Hockey Minigame
description:
based on https://char64.itch.io/partyproject minigames, 

made with plenty of help from char explaining how construct 2 works and also providing me the funny sfx

Controls with arrow keys: 

<> movement 

^ jump

Make sure you hit the shell on the correct side,

You might knock it into the incorrect goal if you're not careful!

If you hit the shell twice while moving forward, it will be boosted!

Try to get the most points in 45 seconds.
